skill.name: debugging-strategies
skill.description: Master systematic debugging techniques, profiling tools, and root cause analysis to efficiently track down bugs across any codebase or technology stack. Use when investigating bugs, performance issues, or unexpected behavior.
skill.summary: Master systematic debugging techniques, profiling tools, and root cause analysis to efficiently trac...
skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. Contains only debugging strategy guidance and educational code examples. No scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Debugging becomes frustrating guesswork without a clear approach. This skill provides proven techniques and tools to systematically track down bugs, performance issues, and unexpected behavior across any codebase.
actual_capabilities: Apply scientific method to debugging problems
Guide through systematic reproduction and isolation of bugs
Recommend appropriate debugging tools for different languages
Guide production debugging with safe investigation methods
limitations: Cannot execute code or run debuggers directly
Cannot access user files or runtime environments
Cannot attach to running processes or debug live applications
Provides guidance only - user must implement fixes

use_cases.title: Track down elusive bugs
use_cases.description: Apply systematic techniques to find the root cause of bugs in your codebase

use_cases.title: Debug production issues
use_cases.description: Use safe investigation methods to diagnose problems in live systems

use_cases.title: Profile application performance
use_cases.description: Identify bottlenecks and memory issues using profiling tools

prompt_templates.title: Basic debugging help
prompt_templates.scenario: I have a bug to fix
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me debug [describe the issue]. What systematic approach should I use to find the root cause?

prompt_templates.title: Performance investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: My application [describe app] has performance issues. Guide me through profiling to find bottlenecks.

prompt_templates.title: Production issue
prompt_templates.prompt: We're experiencing [describe production issue]. How should I safely investigate without affecting users?

prompt_templates.title: Memory leak hunt
prompt_templates.prompt: I suspect a memory leak in [describe application]. Walk me through detecting and finding memory leaks.

output_examples.input: My Node.js API is crashing intermittently with no clear pattern. The error logs show connection timeouts.
output: ‚Ä¢ Start by reproducing the issue consistently - note exact timing and conditions
‚Ä¢ Check for race conditions in async operations, especially database connections
‚Ä¢ Use Chrome DevTools to capture heap snapshots before and after incidents
‚Ä¢ Review recent changes to connection pooling or timeout configurations
‚Ä¢ Consider adding structured logging to trace request flow end-to-end

best_practices: Reproduce the issue consistently before attempting fixes
Isolate the problem by removing unrelated code and dependencies
Use version control history to identify what changed when bugs appeared
anti_patterns: Making multiple changes simultaneously - test one variable at a time
Ignoring error messages or not reading full stack traces
Relying only on console.log instead of proper debugger tools

faq.question: Which languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill covers JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Go debugging techniques. Principles apply to any language.

faq.question: What are the limits of AI-assisted debugging?
faq.answer: AI can guide strategy and suggest tools but cannot execute code, attach debuggers, or access your running systems.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my IDE?
faq.answer: The skill provides guidance for VS Code debug configurations and other IDE debugging setups. You apply recommendations manually.

faq.question: Is my code data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill. Code you share is processed by your AI tool and follows its privacy policy.

faq.question: Why is my debugger not stopping at breakpoints?
faq.answer: Common causes: code not rebuilt with source maps, wrong debug configuration, optimized minified code, or breakpoints in unreachable code paths.

faq.question: How is this different from asking AI directly?
faq.answer: This skill provides a structured debugging framework, tool recommendations, and systematic processes rather than ad-hoc assistance.
